column4: Anyone have any suggestions / experience working with ATHEROS MADWIFI? I am detecting networks but can't connect to them. CARD - ATHEROS AR5007 on UBUNTU 8.10
I haven't used madwifi in a while but seeing networks and not be able to join them is quite common to the drivers not being properly loaded in the Kernel
any ideas on how to do that? or links you may know of?
